extendedInfo.description: 1.A Living Nightmare2.The Vampire Assistant3.Tunnels Of Blood4.Vampire Mountain5.Trials Of Death6.Vampire Prince7.Hunters Of The Dusk8.Allies Of The Night9.Killers of the Dawn10.The Lake of Souls11.Lord of the Shadows12.Sons of DestinyThe first four books of the frightening saga of a young boy whose visit to a mysterious freak show leads him on a journey into a dark world of vampires are collected here, and include A Living Nightmare, The Vampire's Assistant, Tunnels of Blood, and Vampire Mountain.

reviews.title: How to sort blank screen.
reviews.comment: I am now going to tell you how to unzip the file. The  file is zipped therefore you can\'t see the files. So we need to upzip it, install andro zip and open the program, scroll until you you find a folder named vernon book, open it, there will be another  folder named after this program name, open that and press the zip file, and click the option called extract here. Then press on it again and press extract to. Press parent folder then press extract here above. Make sure you open this app before you do this.
reviews.author: Isabelle Whiteley
